Package com.bumptech.glide.manager

Interface LifecycleListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConnectivityMonitor, FutureTarget<R>, Target<R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppWidgetTarget, BaseTarget, BitmapImageViewTarget, BitmapThumbnailImageViewTarget, CustomTarget, CustomViewTarget, DrawableImageViewTarget, DrawableThumbnailImageViewTarget, ImageViewTarget, NotificationTarget, PreloadTarget, RequestFutureTarget, RequestManager, SimpleTarget, TargetTracker, ThumbnailImageViewTarget, ViewTarget
    public interface LifecycleListener
    An interface for listener to Fragment and Activity lifecycle events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onDestroy()
      Callback for when Fragment.onDestroy()} or Activity.onDestroy() is called.
      void onStart()
      Callback for when Fragment.onStart()} or Activity.onStart() is called.
      void onStop()
      Callback for when Fragment.onStop()} or Activity.onStop()} is called.
